example.name: autogen1
example.text: a former Par official who pleaded guilty to providing an FDA employee an illegal gratuity of $ 3,000

example.name: autogen2
example.text: Peter E. Voss , an ex-member of the Postal Service board of governors , to accept $ 23,000 in bribes , kickbacks and gratuities
example.arg: Peter E. Voss , an ex-member of the Postal Service board of governors ,
